description: You thrive in front of an audience. You know how to entrance them, entertain them, and even inspire them.
backEquip: One Musical Instrument of your choice
The Favour of an Admirer (Love letter, Lock of Hair, or Trinket
feature: By Popular Demand: You can always find a place to perform, usually in an inn or tavern but possibly a circus, at a theater, or even in a noble's court. At such a place, you receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard as long as you perform. In addition your performance makes you something of a local figure. When Strangers recognize you in a town where you have performed, they typically take a liking to you.
